forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
The evening in Downtown San Francisco carries a hint of mystery, with the sky draped in a delicate veil of partly cloudy hues. As the temperature settles around a mild 51 degrees, a gentle southwest breeze unfurls, whispering secrets of the bay and the coolness of the approach of night. The city hums with subdued energy, the shimmering lights reminiscent of distant stars starting to blink awake, while the iconic silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge merges with the onset of dusk, softened by the calming embrace of the marine layer that lingers but does not shroud.

As dawn breaks on Wednesday, the promise of a mostly sunny day unfolds, with a high near 64. The chill of the morning will gradually recede, leaving the air refreshed and inviting, as light breezes play through the city streets. The scenery is expected to brighten, yet a trace of that signature San Francisco fog may still wrap around the coastal edges, adding a layer of romantic complexity. The recommendation for attire slips comfortably between light layers—a soft sweater or jacket for the early hours, giving way to a t-shirt for the warmth of midday. With the day unfolding so serenely, consider a stroll along the Embarcadero or a leisurely visit to a local café, savoring a quiet morning cup while absorbing the unfolding beauty of this vibrant cityscape, gently coaxed into life by the sun.
